weka.dl4j.updater

Interface Updater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.nd4j.linalg.learning.config.IUpdater, OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaDelta, AdaGrad, Adam, AdaMax, Nadam, Nesterovs, NoOp, RmsProp, Sgd

    public interface Updater
extends OptionHandler, org.nd4j.linalg.learning.config.IUpdater
    Default Updater that implements WEKA option handling.
    Author:
    Steven Lang
